title: Get a sweet discount on the new iQOO Z6 & Z6 Pro during Amazonâ€™s ongoing Summer Sale
content:
iQOO recently unveiled two new smartphones in India: the iQOO Z6 44W and iQOO Z6 Pro. Both phones give you a bang for your buck, offering impressive specs at affordable prices. The iQOO Z6 44W is an affordable, budget-friendly offering, while the iQOO Z6 Pro is more premium and caters to the mid-range segment. Both

The post Get a sweet discount on the new iQOO Z6 & Z6 Pro during Amazon’s ongoing Summer Sale appeared first on XDA.
description: The iQOO Z6 44W and iQOO Z6 Pro will go on sale in India starting May 4. Both phones are already seeing big discounts in Amazon Summer sale.
